name: Nakoma Resort
description: Nakoma Resort is a Frank Lloyd Wright-inspired mountain retreat in the Lost Sierra, home to the Dragon Golf Course — one of Northern California's most dramatic layouts. The resort features lodge rooms, spa villas, and townhome-style residences surrounded by towering pines and alpine meadows. With an on-site spa, restaurant, pool, and direct access to one of the most unique golf experiences in the state, Nakoma is the ultimate base camp for Graeagle-area golf trips.
shortDescription: Frank Lloyd Wright-inspired resort with the Dragon Golf Course, spa villas, and mountain luxury in the Lost Sierra.
highlights: Home of the Dragon Golf Course
Near Graeagle Meadows, Plumas Pines, Whitehawk Ranch

faqs.question: Is Nakoma Resort close to the Dragon Golf Course?
faqs.answer: The Dragon Golf Course is on-site at Nakoma Resort. Walk from your room to the first tee in minutes.

faqs.question: What room types are available for golf groups?
faqs.answer: Nakoma offers lodge rooms, spa villas with private hot tubs, and multi-bedroom townhome residences perfect for groups of 4-12.

faqs.question: How far is Nakoma from other Graeagle-area courses?
faqs.answer: Graeagle Meadows is 10 minutes, Plumas Pines is 12 minutes, and Whitehawk Ranch is about 20 minutes.
